sentences.sContent: When do you think the patient can be operated on for the tumor?
sentences.sContent_eng: When do you think the patient can be operated on for the tumor?
sentences.sCn: 你认为这个病人什么时候可以做肿瘤手术？

sentences.sContent: Staging of prostatic adenocarcinoma is based upon how extensive the tumor is.
sentences.sContent_eng: Staging of prostatic adenocarcinoma is based upon how extensive the tumor is.
sentences.sCn: 前列腺腺癌的分级是根据肿瘤的浸润程度而定的。

sentences.sContent: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.sContent_eng: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.sCn: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的，处在很有可能治愈阶段。

phrases.pCn: 卵黄囊瘤；卵巢内胚层窦瘤
